TextView.android:text: This application is for those employees who want to file a Leave for a different purpose they need for.
All Municipal Officials, Permanent, Temporary and Casual Employees
1. Application for Leave (CSC Form 6, Revised 2020) with proper supporting documents (3 copies)
\n- Municipal Disaster Risk Reduction Management Office
1. Submit accomplish Application for Leave (CSC Form No. 6) with the approval of the Department Head
1.1. Receive and Review accomplish Application for Leave (CSC Form No. 6) with complete supporting documents (if needed).
1.2. Certify available leave credits and record leave on the Employee Leave Card and Leave Credits Electronic File.
2. Receive Application for Leave (with HRMO certified availability of leave credits) and secure approval and signature of the Local Chief Executive
2.1. Return form to employee and instruct to submit an original copy of Application for Leave to HRMO after securing the approval and signature of the Local Chief Executive
3. Submit one original copy of the approved Application for Leave to HRMO
3.1. Receive and file the Application for Leave
4. Fill up Client Satisfaction Survey (CSS) Form and drop at the Feedback box
